1.title: Inner Hebrides

episode of.title: Little British Isles with Alison Steadman (TV Series 2016)

1.plot: Alison Steadman learns how to extract orchid essence, visits a unique fish farm, meets a bee keeper and samples a few drams of whisky as she visits the beautiful islands of Gigha, Jura, Colonsay and Oronsay in the Inner Hebrides.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Little British Isles with Alison Steadman (TV Series 2016)

2.plot: Alison travels across the English Channel to explore the unique identity of the Channel Islands. She learns about the impact of the Nazi occupation, inseminates an iconic Jersey cow and visits the car-free island of Sark.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Little British Isles with Alison Steadman (TV Series 2016)

3.plot: The actress concludes the series with a visit to the Isles of Scilly, discovering one of the finest sub-tropical gardens in the northern hemisphere, a Robinson Crusoe-style desert island and works on one of the world's smallest dairy farms.

imdb.title: Little British Isles with Alison Steadman
akas: Little British Isles with Alison Steadman (United Kingdom)
plot: The actress embarks on a journey around the British coast visiting some of the 267 inhabited islands. She celebrates their wild beauty, meets some of the people who call them home and finds out what life is like on these hidden jewels.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
